m_szDocSumamry: Sustainable Transportation: Analyzing the Transition to Alternative Fuel Vehicles Paul Leiby 4500-N Bethel Valley Road Oak Ridge National Laboratory Oak Ridge, TN 37831-6205 leibypn@ornl.gov and Jonathan Rubin Margaret Chase Smith Center for Public Policy, and Department of Resource Economics and Policy 5715 Coburn Hall Orono, Maine 04469 jonathan.rubin@umit.maine.edu Presented at the 1997 Asilomar conference on Policies for Fostering Sustainable Transportation Technologies August 17-20, 1997 1Alternative fuel policies are evaluated in the context of gasoline price projections made by the U.S.
